name: Cheryl Phillips
text: We had lots of fun eating gelato and playing mini golf! ⛳

name: heather woodard
text: Had a blast!! It was nice weather and a perfect day for putt putt. Very friendly and a fun course.

name: Molly Vecsey
text: What an awesome little mini golf place! We had a blast! All three kids (10, 3, and 1) and so much fun! And the gelato was the perfect treat at the end! Will be back!

name: Preston Albritton
text: We took the whole family plus grandma.  We had a great time, in spite of the crazy hot weather.  Holes are challenging and fun.  Owner/operator was super nice, great facility.  Frozen yogurt after 18 long, hot holes is genius. Give it a try. You'll have fun!

name: Victoria McGuire
text: Great customer service, family-friendly place to hang out! Incredible gelato!

name: Will Little
text: Had a great experience, the kids loved the frozen yogurt. Glad to see a local place to take the kids for a treat rather than a large chain. Definitely stop by for frozen yogurt, gelato, and mini golf.

name: Deana Mann
text: We had a great experience playing golf last night! The owner is super nice and very helpful! The icecream was a nice addition. We had almond joy and mint chocolate chip.

name: jon vancoille
text: Really great fun place. Take the whole family and enjoy yogurt, golf, or both! Staff is friendly and the mini golf is fun!

name: Karla Quinn
text: Peach gelato was delicious and had some me real peaches in it!  Hubby had chocolate yogurt that was 👌!  JoJo's was clean and seating area is bright and friendly!

name: Steve Mann
text: Nice outing. Fun round of mini golf.

name: Mark Norman
text: Very good Gelato. More importantly nice folks there.

name: J Renzenburger
text: Owner was super nice and yogurt was incredible not to mention a ton of toppings. I will be back!

name: Robert Ward
text: Great little place for fun

name: Beth Weathers
text: All the family enjoyed Jo Jo

name: Sheree Poe
text: Awesome

name: Patrick Stephens
text: Pretty cool

name: B Y (gocubsgo)
text: Southwest Greens has done an amazing job for us. They went above and beyond with their service and actually did more than we asked them to do. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to do a turf job. You won't be disappointed!

name: Fred Thomas
text: Andrew and his crews are amazing. He is an artist of synthetic turf   Very pleased with the quality of work and Product.  Southwest Greens is the best!

name: Duncan Cook
text: Andrew was an absolute pleasure to work with and my family and I are ecstatic with our putting green.  It has totally transformed our backyard and is a huge hit!

name: Wendy Heath
text: The Company did a fantastic job and Andrew was great to work with I highly recommend them

name: Scott Fuller
text: I have worked with Andrew and his crew on multiple projects. He stands behind his work and they do a great job.

name: Tommy Maurer
text: High quality and an overall great experience.

name: Stephen Rice
text: We are blown away by the quality and professionalism of this company.  I'm in Huntsville and they install up here as well. Highly recommend them!

name: Chad Hathorne
text: Nothing but the best. They did a great job on my back yard. Looks perfect year-round.

name: Zandra Lockett
text: Kids enjoyed themselves. Pretty sure they'll be going back.

name: Gary Pearcy
text: Great entertainment, prices and snacks best deal in town. Skate, play golf,games.. Just a good family place!!

name: Charlene DeBusk
text: Wonderful place for our kids to be in a Christian environment.

name: Chewy Mustard
text:
Its a really cool place and fun to hang out with friends they have arcade games 🕹 and a basketball game that you can play with friends

There's a claw machine stacker racing game and air hockey

Putt putt golf and mini golf

Not to mention how fun skating is

And Jennifer is so sweet

Would recommend

name: Derrus Powe
text: Twin River Roller Rink has amazing workers very generous and great food. The atmosphere is always fun and very enjoyable for all kids. I would really recommend this roller rink if there any parties or just to go have fun.

name: Todd McHaney
text: Great place to take kids

name: Courtney Clanton
text: Very nice facility. We had a party of about 13 kids. They are reasonable. There is also a area to play golf inside and outside as well as a few arcade games.

name: eddie foster
text: Great place for fun

name: Heather Flowers
text: My Granddaughter had her birthday party there and she had a great time.....

name: Larry Harkless Sr
text: Very good, need more games.

name: Jennifer Toliver
text: Had a blast. Will go back again

name: Dixie Bishop
text: Kids had a blast

name: Troy Sutton
text: Great place for the kids to go roller skating!

name: Carla Darrington
text: Fun for kids

name: Carla Gwin
text: Nice for a small town rink.
